body.p:
Frankfort Ky Oct 8th 1861
To His Excellency Gov McGoffin
Sir
I beg leave to enclose the oath taken by me as Paymaster Genl of KY and notify of my acceptance of the office
I beg also to request that you will direct a written notification of my appointment & acceptance to be made to the Military Board of Kentucky
This I believe is the usual Course in Military proceedings that the appointing power notifies of his appointments

T. N. Lindsey
Oath as Paymaster Genl
Filed Oct 10. 1861
